attributes.action: Remove the TV licence fee and introduce a subscription charge.
attributes.additional_details: To give the consumers more control and choice over what they watch on tv and what they are charged for.
attributes.background: Allow people a choice to subscribe to live tv where you currently require a tv licence to watch. Make viewing like other channels eg. Netflix, Disney Channel, Amazon Prime. If you choose to watch them then you pay a subscription fee. Get rid of the TV licence fee.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Scrap the BBC TV Licence & replace funding with adverts or paywall
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727365
